title: I study accounting & most companies deal with riba, should I change my profession? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: my question is regarding accounting i'm an accounting student and so now i'll be going in the real world where it's expected of me to account for firms transactions and or prepare documents today muslim and non-muslim countries deal with banks and lenders alike i.e interest as far as i know i should not even witness such contracts when riba when rival is concerned let alone account for it what should i do should i change my profession i don't i don't want i don't want to compromise my deen for anything very good as long as i can as long as you know this answers your problems yes all scholars our scholars trusted scholars bimbasman ethemine the permanent committee of ifta they all say accounting jobs that includes registering auditing um counting down interest whether incoming or outgoing is riba and the one who's doing it is cursed so yes definitely change your uh major and look for something that is halal and allah knows best and may allah make things easy for you and for all of us you
